name: Monke Biznis
description:
Monke Biznis is a monkey themed idle game and web toy that lets you manage and interact with your own zoo.  Pet your monkeys, collect shit, make them fight, and rake in bananas - It's business baby.

Made by Colin Watterson and Jameson Danning for LOWREZJAM.

(There is currently no saved progress, sorry)

How To Play:

Left click MonkeEarn BananaRight click Monke
Open Upgrade menuLeft Click ScoreOpen ShopScroll in shopSee more MonkeLeft Click Name in
